>
[Alchemist's Flamethrower](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1972)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="Alchemical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=6" />
<trait label="Fire" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=72" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 63 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 35 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 2 hands

**Bulk** 1
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This long cylinder is topped by a pair of brass sockets and a collection of polished pipes and tubes. A total of two vials of [alchemist's fire](/Equipment.aspx?ID=75) must be loaded into the sockets at the base of the weapon and the tubes cleaned and primed. Properly loading the flamethrower in this way takes 1 minute. When the trigger on a loaded flamethrower is pulled, the alchemist's fire is siphoned into the rifle and shot out of the muzzle in a line of fire. The damage dealt by a flamethrower is determined by the strength of the weakest alchemist's fire loaded into the flamethrower.
